oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Case Report: Mastitis Outbreak in Beef Bulls on a Feeding Test
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rollin, E.
Nickerson, S. C.
Ensley, D. T.
Berghaus, R. T.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: mastitis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The cause of an epidemic of mastitis is still undetermined, but it is hypothesized by the authors that the mastitis was an opportunistic invasion of mammary glands that were hypersecretory due to high levels of phytoestrogens in the feed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2008; 262
